author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE RECONNAISSANCE FINDS LORENA STILL A CATEGORY 1 HURRICANE... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR...
summary: ...AIR FORCE RECONNAISSANCE FINDS LORENA STILL A CATEGORY 1 HURRICANE... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 2:00 PM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 22.8, -112.4 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 985 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE RECONNAISSANCE FINDS LORENA STILL A CATEGORY 1 HURRICANE... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... title: Summary - Hurricane Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
